answerText: The Journey to the East [or Die Morgenlandfahrt][10]  The Journey to the East is a work by this German author of Steppenwolf and Siddhartha.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 4 | 15 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Leo's disappearance in a mountain range causes a group to panic. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel whose protagonist joins "The League," a conglomeration of great talents such as Mozart and Plato, as they take the title expedition to find the "ultimate Truth."
